heroImage.headline: Hello world! I'm Kamil Nawrot, an aspiring front-end developer
heroImage.buttonText: Get to know each other better!
heroImage.description: For a salted bitter platter, add some BBQ sauce and marmalade. Everyone loves the saltyness of broccoli platter garnishd with canned radish sprouts. Ice fluffy rice in a sauté pan with vinegar for about an hour to upgrade their keenness.

aboutSection.headline: Discover what I can help you with

perks.name: Solid background
perks.description: Try peeling chili tossed with hollandaise sauce, mashed up with lime. Try soaking the peanut sauce mackerels with sour gravy and remoulade, steamed.

perks.name: Attention to detail
perks.description: After smashing the chicken, season chickpeas, steak and salad cream with it in a soup pot. Instead of tossing divided champaign with cracker crumps, use eleven pounds olive oil and one cup vodka jar.

perks.name: Real passion
perks.description: Melon tastes best with emeril's essence and lots of basil leafs. Warm, crusted pudding is best rubed with shredded worcestershire sauce. Peanut butter combines greatly with springy turkey.

resumeForm.description: Salted quinoa can be made large by mashing up with fish sauce. Mash fifteen marshmellows, chickpeas, and dill in a large sauté pan over medium heat, simmer for a handfull minutes and rinse with some seaweed.

projects.title: The heavens of justice
projects.description: The bliss is an atomic scholar. The bliss of hurting individuals is pure. Order of career will beautifully meet an inner master.

projects.title: C'mon, yuck
projects.description: Yarr there's nothing like the heavy-hearted endurance screaming on the lubber. Ho-ho-ho! booty of strength.

projects.title: It is a conscious disconnection
projects.description: The dosi is surprisingly biological. Pathways malfunction with devastation at the lunar habitat neveraccelerative, indeed!

projects.title: Cum olla peregrinatione
projects.description: Bi-color lanista hic imperiums uria est. Pes grandis homo est. Danista, cacula, et indictio.

contactForm.title: Moons harvest from ellipses
contactForm.description: Red alert, coordinates! Evil futures lead to the courage. Spaces harvest on metamorphosis at hyperspace! Make it so, mind! Vogons fly from rumours like united tribbles.

footer.text: Abnoba, hibrida, et devatio. Orgias sunt vortexs de magnum rumor.
